jml.regression
Class Regression

java.lang.Object
  jml.regression.Regression
Direct Known Subclasses:
LASSO
public abstract class Regression
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract super class for all regression methods.

Version:
1.0 Jan. 14th, 2013
Author:
Mingjie Qian
